members.name: Microsoft
members.address: One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA 98052-6399, USA
members.other_info: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company that develops, manufactures, licenses, supports, and sells computer software, consumer electronics, and personal computers.

members.name: Adobe
members.address: 345 Park Avenue, San Jose, California 95110-2704, USA
members.other_info: Adobe Inc. is an American multinational computer software company headquartered in San Jose, California. It has historically focused upon the creation of multimedia and creativity software products, with a more recent foray into digital marketing software.

members.name: Google
members.address: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, California 94043, USA
members.other_info: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, a search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware.

members.name: Oracle
members.address: 500 Oracle Parkway, Redwood Shores, California 94065, USA
members.other_info: Oracle Corporation is an American multinational computer technology corporation headquartered in Redwood Shores, California. The company sells database software and technology, cloud engineered systems, and enterprise software products—particularly its own brands of database management systems.

members.name: Vocalcom
members.other_info: Vocalcom is a global provider of cloud-based contact center software solutions. Vocalcom's software helps organizations manage customer interactions across all communication channels.

members.name: Meta
members.address: 1 Hacker Way, Menlo Park, California 94025, USA
members.other_info: Meta Platforms, Inc. (formerly Facebook, Inc.) is an American technology conglomerate that develops the Facebook social media platform, among other products. Meta is one of the world's most valuable companies and is considered one of the Big Tech technology companies, alongside Amazon, Apple, Google, and Microsoft.

members.name: Telefónica
members.address: Distrito Telefónica, Ronda de la Comunicación s/n, 28050 Madrid, Spain
members.other_info: Telefónica, S.A. is a Spanish multinational telecommunications company headquartered in Madrid, Spain. It is one of the largest telephone operators and mobile network providers in the world. Telefónica offers fixed and mobile telephony, broadband and subscription television, with operations in Europe, Asia, and the Americas.
